ai-tha-ap143:1.1_0: “Having become fully extinguished, the Fortunate One’s attainment of Nibbāna,
ai-tha-ap143:1.4_0: I cry out at the very moment.
ai-tha-ap143:2.1_0: Having gone on the right time, (but) after passing away,
ai-tha-ap143:2.3_0: I’ve prepared a beard of flowers
ai-tha-ap143:3.2_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap143:3.3_0: I don’t go to a human state,
ai-tha-ap143:3.4_0: this is the fruit of a Shrine.
ai-tha-ap143:4.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap143:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Abhibhū.
ai-tha-ap143:6.1_0: First the first Elder Nun Six
